Notes.Text:
This update for bind fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-6471: Fixed a reachable assert in dispatch.c. (bsc#1138687)

Non-security issue fixed:

- bind will no longer rely on /etc/insserv.conf (bsc#1118367, bsc#1118368)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: A race condition which may occur when discarding malformed packets can result in BIND exiting due to a REQUIRE assertion failure in dispatch.c. Versions affected: BIND 9.11.0 -> 9.11.7, 9.12.0 -> 9.12.4-P1, 9.14.0 -> 9.14.2. Also all releases of the BIND 9.13 development branch and version 9.15.0 of the BIND 9.15 development branch and BIND Supported Preview Edition versions 9.11.3-S1 -> 9.11.7-S1.
